item.title: Working with HTW Machines
item.description:
Copy files from your HRZ Home Directory (aka HTW-Space)

There are rather verbose manuals about various ways to copy files from your HTW-RZ home directory to somewhere else. (see Freigabe von Dateien und Ordner Ã¼ber den Webdrive )

The gist is: you may connect via SSH File Transfer Protocol to the server webdrive.htw-berlin.de (on default port 22)- see example below. The sftp program used in the example is included in the OpenSSH Package; most probably you’ll already have it installed on your computer, e.g. in git-bash on a windows machine.
